name: Dark Colors
description:
Dark Colors is a psychological horror adventure set within an abandoned research facility. Split between three or more 'episodes' you follow your character as you find out what exactly happened here years prior, tasked with exploring the old building and finding classified recordings and documents you start to suspect that you may not be alone in this facility.

Early access content included
The game currently only contains one playable chapter of this story. More 'episodes' to come throughout the early access period until full release.

Main Story
Sent to unearth what this remote research facility was tampering with years prior due to a recent spike in geological temperature in the area, you look around the facility as it's been abandoned for years. As you find more documents and recordings around the facility you start to suspect that your not alone.



Gameplay
As you explore the old abandoned facility while looking for the source of this geological temperature increase in the area, you get deeper in to the facility that was once a massive mining operation for off-shore resources, you will encounter Puzzles, enemies and stealth sections as you discover more about this facility. Don't worry about getting lonely along your adventure though, your co-worker that you communicate with on your radio will keep you company and assist you long the way to help find out where exactly the source of the temperature increase is coming from.



Exploration
As you explore the research facility you find VHS tapes labeled with each employees names accordingly, as you watch these recordings and you see the inner workings of the facility from their perspectives you start to piece together what really happened here and how you might survive this "incident".



As you follow your character throughout the story, expect a thrilling psychological horror adventure split between three or more 'episodes' over the course of the early access period. With the help from feedback and reviews, hopefully we can see this story to the end!

Won't you stick around to find out what this corporation is hiding? It's not really a choice...
